changeSet.author: Rohan
changeSet.comment: Change all Lab Test concept classes from Test to LabTest
changeSet.sql: update concept set class_id=(select concept_class_id from concept_class where name='LabTest') where class_id=1 and concept_id in (select concept_id from concept_set where concept_set=(select concept_id from concept_name where name='All_Tests_and_Panels' and concept_name_type='FULLY_SPECIFIED'));
